WaNoMeta.Description: This WaNo uses a python script to generate a table with two variables, e.g., energy and volume values.

WaNoTemplate.WaNoExecCommand: source /home/ws/gt5111/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh conda activate python Extract_Script.py {{ wano["Search_in_File"] }} {{ wano["Delete_Files"] }} {{ wano["Plot_Figure"] }}\ {% for element in wano["Search_Parameters"] %} {{ element["var"] }} {% endfor %}
